info.author: J Raynor
info.description:
This module provides an alternate implementation of the openpty() and forkpty()
functions using the pty handling code from Openssh.  This should allow those
functions to work across more platforms than the standard python pty module does.
info.name: altpty
info.html_description: This module provides an alternate implementation of the openpty() and forkpty() functions using the pty handling code from Openssh. This should allow those functions to work across more platforms than the standard python pty module does.
